__e: He says he can send a gang of civilians in to help us. As I was telling the sergeant, Captain, we have heard some of your most important generals and newspapermen are on their way up here.
There's no overhead, and you make you a very rich man.
Now, you need to call your generals and tell them to hold their fire.
It would have told him that the phone had already... traveled to CIA headquarters in Langley... and they would have shot both of us in the heads.
If I can narrow the search, we have a chance, but until I know the general vicinity of either of them, I have nothing to track.
If I can sway the generals to my side, I shall return with them and their men beside me.
They let the overhead get out of hand but we have a schedule that shows us cutting back 10% of the administrative staff in a few months.
You may be the eyes and ears, but they are the muscle.
All my generals are in agreement except for you.
